com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.achievement

Class AchievementService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.App42Service
      • com.shephertz.app42.paas.sdk.android.achievement.AchievementService

  • public class AchievementService
extends App42Service
    App42 Achievement Service helps you to assign badge or achievement to your app users. You can also manage your user achievement using create achievement, earn achievement, get achievement etc.
    Author:
    Shephertz
